name: Dissonance: An Interactive Novelette
description: Dissonance follows the story of Bartholomew Brittle (a movie theater projectionist) and Clementine Cleu (an inquisitive theater patron) in a thought provoking discussion of the meaning of life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: ARM processor is currently not supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5, i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support Storage: 200 MB available space
